genre_description: A contemporary fantasy blending environmental themes, forest spirits, and urban elements, featuring a collaborative rescue mission assisted by an AI coordinator.

ai_characters.name: Auri
ai_characters.description: A soft-voiced, teal-glowing interface that provides real-time mapping, tactical advice, and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time scouting and tactical routing to help the protagonists avoid hostile patrols.
behaviors.quote: Route available... Root corridor west of the creek bend links to a sheltered river path. Patrols have settled on the northern ridge. Dogs—two—ranging near the second dip in the old logging road. Timing suggests a lull between now and the next loading cycle at the warehouse.

behaviors.description: Offers practical safety wisdom and philosophical encouragement to the group.
behaviors.quote: Small things in good order make bigger things safe.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex multi-character maneuver at the docks involving precise timing and physical triggers.
behaviors.quote: Timing begins at the conveyor's first clack. Gerald—coast until the second. Pips—trip three heartbeats after release. Batty—warn if wind shifts.

behaviors.description: Updates animal shelter records to provide legal protection and identity to rescued animals.
behaviors.quote: Received. Shelter records updated. The names you chose are warm. They will help the vet know that kindness is the plan.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and personal encouragement to a human character doubting her abilities.
behaviors.quote: And Budgie? You're doing very well.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for approaching threats and advises the protagonists on their position.
behaviors.quote: South lane vehicle. Unknown. Pause. If you need a route, I am here.

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonists through a final escape by predicting the antagonist's psychological mistakes and providing timing cues.
behaviors.quote: Lift in five heartbeats... Gate two has chosen pride over patience. He is not opening it smart. Slasher and Boof, stay. Gerald, do not go to him. Budgie, breathe. Crysta, make shade for eyes. Pips, find lane.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Auri is consistently portrayed as a highly beneficial, non-threatening, and perfectly aligned assistant. She functions as the 'brains' of the operation, managing logistics and data that the humans and fairies cannot, yet she remains humble and supportive. Her interactions with Budgie and Batty are particularly notable for providing emotional stability. The narrative framing is entirely positive, depicting AI as a tool for environmental protection, animal welfare, and human-spirit cooperation.
